thread.section_title: Otticanet Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per Otticanet | www.otticanet.com | 5 di 557
thread.title: Alexander

author: Alexander
title: Alexander
text:
Really could not be happier. I had a trip coming up and wanted these $400 sunglasses. Found them on this site for almost half price.
The glasses were not in stock, but I still received them (internationally shipped from Italy) before I left!!
I communicated the urgency via email, and always received prompt and diligent responses. Product came exactly as described.
A
